metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19950 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20190403 Q8, there is a use-after-free in ThrowException and ThrowLoggedException of magick/error.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19950` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm7
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm7
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm7
libgraphicsmagick++3 - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm7
libgraphicsmagick3 - 1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm7
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.18-1ubuntu3.1+esm7').
